level.heading:
TIER 0 STANDARDS (ยง 20-6208) The Tier 0 standards for soil shall be the following:
(a) Total petroleum hydrocarbons (TPH) gasoline range organics (GRO) or dieselange organics (DRO) shall be no greater than one hundred parts per million (100pm);
(b) Total benzene, toluene, ethylbenzene, and total xylenes (BTEX) shall be noore than ten parts per million (10 ppm); and
(c) Benzene concentration shall be no more than one part per million (1 ppm).
SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 7835, 7892 (November 12, 1993); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7699 (October 1, 1999).
